link.name: link
link.description: A list of links to avoid when doing the shortest path calculation
link.validation_error_text: Parameter link only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

type.name: type
type.description: type of circuit we are building
type.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter type does not match pattern /^(openflow|mpls)$/

node.name: node
node.description: An array of node names to connect together with the shortest path.
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: get_shortest_path
description: returns the shortest contiguous path between the given nodes
